marketing: People willing to put together a kiosk of sorts to explain the project during the CSE carnival.
engineering: MEs to figure out the literal nuts and bolts of the design and build the project from raw metal.
other: Powerful bikers to pedal the beest once it is all completed.
design: Anyone who wants to embellesh the beest with bells, whistles, pyrotechnics etc.

project_goal: Using the mechanism developed by Theo Jansen, engineer an 8ft tall metal, mechanical, pedal-powered walker.
project_categories: ME, Design, Others for bells and whistles

project_leaders.name: Sam Finnegan
project_leaders.desc: Sam is a sophomore studying mechanical engineering. He enjoys mechanical machinations, new ideas, and long walks on the beach.
